subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A fierce competitor, Caroline Hedwall, 26, has kept her cool to help Europe win the past two Solheim Cups and she's back on the team at the event this weekend in Germany.
snippet: A fierce competitor, Caroline Hedwall, 26, has kept her cool to help Europe win the past two Solheim Cups and she's back on the team at the event this weekend in Germany.
